Name: Commedia All'italiana
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist..
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Full-flavoured and bittersweet. Some will prefer this aperitivo with the dilution that comes with serving over ice in an old-fashioned glass.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2017 by Seba Atienza in Argentina for Campari.
Nutrition: One serving of Commedia All'italiana contains 205 calories
